name: lager
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a type of beer that is pale in colour and usually contains a lot of bubbles: Two pints of lager and a packet of crisps, please. The first golden lager beer was created in what is now the Czech Republic.
[ C ] a glass or container of this type of beer: I'll have a lager.
More examplesFewer examplesA cold glass of lager would go well with this.Lager beer is the traditional beer style of many countries.I fetched another can of lager from the fridge.They don't sell British beer at all, just Dutch and German lagers.Lager beers come in all varieties of flavors, strengths, and colors.He's had too many lagers.Greasy food is exactly what you need on a Friday night, after a few lager beers down the pub.
